name: Ala-CAZAS!
description:
Play as a wizard who's been transported into the future!

== CONTROLS ==

W - jump

A / D - move left/right

Scroll Wheel - select spell

Cursor - aim spell

Left Click - use spell

== CREDITS ==

Background Cityscape by Luis Zuno: https://opengameart.org/content/warped-city

Ground Robot by LydianAlchemist: https://www.reddit.com/r/PixelArt/comments/cfwcex/oc_robot_pixel_art_noob_critique_welcome/
